# Basic Application Insights Workbook Example

This fixture demonstrates a basic Application Insights Workbook configuration.

## Features

- Creates a workbook with required inputs only
- Uses `jsonencode()` for `data_json`
- Creates a dedicated resource group

## Key Configuration

This fixture focuses on minimal required configuration for validation.

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
